title: Kirby and the Forgotten Stomach
description:
This week we're diving into the latest installment of the long-running Kirby franchise, Kirby and the Forgotten Land. We'll also discuss Sony's attempt to take on the juggernaut that is Game Pass with its new PlayStation Plus service. 

Other games discussed: 13 Sentinels, Tunic.
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (Russ Frushtick, Chris Plante, Justin McElroy)
